name: Sekhmet
title: Sekhmet (Sakhmet) - Egyptian Mythology
subtitle: Goddess of War, Healing, and Divine Vengeance
shortDescription: Sekhmet is the lioness-headed goddess of war, plague, and healing. The Eye of Ra sent to punish rebellious humanity, she became drunk on bloodlust until tricked by Ra into drinking beer dyed red. Consort of Ptah , mother of Nefertum. Both destroyer and healer - her priests were physicians who could cause or cure disease.
longDescription: Full detailed mythology and worship information coming soon. For now, see related deities and use the corpus search to explore ancient texts mentioning Sekhmet.
